name: Proflex速 PR11
description: Proflex速 PR11 is primer necessary companion products to be used with the Proflex速 series of elastomeric membranes. The PR11 is designed to condition and prepare a substrate for the application of Proflex速 membranes. PR11 primer is formulated for interior or exterior conditions and can be applied easily and safely to a variety of substrates. It is safe, non-flammable, water based product. Easy installation, can be applied with roller of pressure sprayer.
